mdRecord.dcterms:description: Quote attributed to fictional character Homer Simpson, of the animated TV series The Simpsons. Confession purportedly by someone named Kevin. Sad doodle labeled "hopes and dreams" [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
The text within this image may be offensive to some.
"Trying is the first step towards failure." - Homer Simpson | my name is Kevin and I have a big wiener!

Quotations
Doodles
Penis
